attributes.action: Reinstate the death penaltly instead of life imprisonment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I don't know about anybody else but i think the death penaltly should brought back to sort out this country's over crowding of prisons  and increase in the crime.
 It's not just terrorists that need sorting out it's the child molesters, serial killers, serial rapisted or anyone who has been handed a sentance over 25 years, it's our taxes that keep these kind of people in a cushy enviroment called prison, where they get three square meals a day and a comfty bed to sleep in, thats more than a homeless shetler gets.The money that would be saved if the death penaltly was in place could go to the NSH or Education, things that help our childern and grandchildren in the future and our country.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/DeathPenalty2007/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
